about.title: About Me
description: I'm a fullstack developer with 3 years of professional experience building modern products using Next.js, Node.js, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS. I focus on writing clean, maintainable, and product-oriented code, with special attention to architecture and scalability.

I've worked on both frontend and backend, automated deployments, led technical refactors, and helped others grow. I approach every project as if it were my own, always aiming to deliver real value through well-thought-out solutions. I don't just want things to work â€” I want them to be done right.

responsibilities: Design and implementation of microservices architecture using NestJS, MongoDB and Prisma
Complete automation of deployment cycle with CI/CD in GitHub Actions and Docker Compose
Legacy code refactoring with focus on scalability and service decoupling
Development of administrative interfaces in Next.js (App Router) with TailwindCSS and Server Actions
Technical mentoring to interns (code review, task definition and pairing)
Complete UI redesign maintaining compatibility with legacy backend
Implementation of design system with TailwindCSS and Radix UI
Documentation and development of reusable components with Storybook
Performance optimization and SSR with Next.js
Progressive TypeScript integration in JavaScript codebase
